official_title: Effects of Adapted Tango on African-American Women Caregivers of Alzheimer's Disease Patients
inclusion_criteria:
* Women family caregivers from the Emory ADRC and Dr. Wharton's studies of Alzheimer's disease (AD) caregivers
* Parental diagnosis 'probable AD'
* African-American
* 45-65 years of age
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 45 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
